name: GetProductVariantInfo
description:
Retrieve information on a specific product variant.

Call this tool to get detailed information about a specific product variant in an e-commerce store. Useful for fetching variant details such as size, color, price, or stock status from a specified store's product.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the store to query the product variant details.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The ID of the product in the specified store. Required to retrieve variant details.

value_schema.description: The id for the product of a store.

parameters.name: product_variant_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the product variant in the store.

value_schema.description: The id for the product variant.

parameters.name: fields_to_return
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of product variant fields to return, using dot notation for sub-objects.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

parameters.name: exclude_fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to exclude in the response. Use dot notation for sub-object parameters.

value_schema.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.
